abstract: Voluminous archive of documents and recorded meetings that American forces captured after they invaded Iraq in 2003, small portion of which has been opened to researchers, depict Saddam Hussein as a leader who harbored grand ambitions but who was prone to conspiratorial thinking and epic miscalculations.
snippet: Transcripts and documents depict Saddam Hussein as a leader who harbored grand ambitions for his country but was prone to epic miscalculations.
lead_paragraph: Transcripts and documents depict Saddam Hussein as a leader who harbored grand ambitions for his country but was prone to epic miscalculations.

headline.main: Papers From Iraqi Archive Reveal Conspiratorial Mind-Set of Hussein
headline.print_headline: Papers From Iraqi Archive Reveal Conspiratorial Mind-Set of Hussein
headline.seo: Iraq Archive Reveals Saddam Hussein’s Conspiratorial Mind-Set
